channel.title: [PI] - Serious Custom Quest Help
channel.description: Guys i've searched Guide after Guide after Guide... I want to LEARN how to add a new quest, I got 18 custom quests that I need to create for my server... All the search engines can find are either guides on how to make quests for example: Cook's assistant or Source downloads with custom quests in them... I would LOVE to be able to know how to add a custom quest...Completely. As far as adding the NPC's I need to adding Dialog, to adding interfaces of the quest itself. Could someone please help me.

item.title: [PI] - Serious Custom Quest Help
item.dc:creator: @No_Faith No Faith
item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

I changed the name but this is all i have in player.java:

	nyEvent = 0,

Please reply on my new thread:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

[/quote]Sure, do that. That’s not very good naming though. It would be easier to remember as newYear instead of newYears1.[/quote]Okay will do, give me a second.

item.title: [PI] - Serious Custom Quest Help
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

You replace the # with 7333 if you read farther in the thread you would see the fix was posted… You just hover over the name and it says the id. And for the orphaned case, that’s because the case is outside of the switch statement.

Put case 836 under firstclicknpc under the switch statement.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] - Serious Custom Quest Help
item.dc:creator: @No_Faith No Faith
item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

playerAssistant.java

public void loadQuests() { if(c.cookAss == 0) { sendFrame126("@red@Cook's Assistant", ####); } else if(c.cookAss == 3) { sendFrame126("@gre@Cook's Assistant", ####); } else { sendFrame126("@yel@Cook's Assistant", ####); } }
This is what I do not understand, what do I replace the #'s with? I am following this guide http://google.com/runescape-development/google/tutorials/308148-pi-cooks-assistant-quest.html
any help is appreciated.
ALSO, after following all this this is my only error:

src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:1278: error: orphaned case case 836: ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] - Serious Custom Quest Help
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“No Faith, post:11, topic:459035”][quote author=mr extremez link=topic=561943.msg4098342#msg4098342 date=1347134587]
Declare an int for the quest like this in,

player.java

Then add a check in actionhandler to the npc you want to talk to or the npc you need to kill like this

case npcid: if (c.questStages == 0) { c.sendMessage("You haven't killed the monster yet."); } else if (c.questStages == 1) { //quest shit here } break;

Then in npchandler in the dropsItem method add

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { c.questStages += 1; }
[/quote]
Thanks you’ve been helpful, I am going to get started…! If I get stumped along the way I will post it here, if you could help again please.[/quote]Alright no problem

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] - Serious Custom Quest Help
item.dc:creator: @No_Faith No Faith
item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:10, topic:459035”]Declare an int for the quest like this in,

player.java

Then add a check in actionhandler to the npc you want to talk to or the npc you need to kill like this

case npcid: if (c.questStages == 0) { c.sendMessage("You haven't killed the monster yet."); } else if (c.questStages == 1) { //quest shit here } break;

Then in npchandler in the dropsItem method add

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { c.questStages += 1; }[/quote]
Thanks you’ve been helpful, I am going to get started…! If I get stumped along the way I will post it here, if you could help again please.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] - Serious Custom Quest Help
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Declare an int for the quest like this in,

player.java

Then add a check in actionhandler to the npc you want to talk to or the npc you need to kill like this

case npcid: if (c.questStages == 0) { c.sendMessage("You haven't killed the monster yet."); } else if (c.questStages == 1) { //quest shit here } break;

Then in npchandler in the dropsItem method add

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { c.questStages += 1; }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] - Serious Custom Quest Help

item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:2, topic:459035”]You could make a questhandler, I have one but I’m not going to spoonfeed you. But basically if you don’t have a handler just use this layout, it should work fine.

http://www.rune-serber.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/308148-pi-cooks-assistant-quest.html[/quote]That link didn’t work.
And I want to LEARN how to add a complete quest, like how to make it where I have to obtain items, and kill npc’s to complete the quest…
I don’t expect you to spoonfeed me, I just am trying to learn how to do this type of stuff. As I said, I got about 18+ quests to add to my server, all I need is just one example of how to make a quest, not just a COPY&PASTE guide either, I want them to explain to me what everything is doing…

Read full topic
